akn:section.akn:heading: Merger or consolidation — Approval by Mayor.

akn:content.akn:p: The plan of merger or of consolidation and the filings required by § 31-5803 shall be mailed to shareholders, to members, or to policyholders of the domestic merging and consolidating companies, and shall be filed with the Mayor according to § 31-5803 [repealed].

A life company aggrieved by the Mayor’s decision to disapprove a plan of merger or of consolidation with the Mayor under subsection (a) of this section shall have the rights, under § 31-5803 [repealed], to judicial review of the decision.
